oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abraham Lincoln
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite. Studio portrait profile of President Abraham Lincoln. Written in pen across the bottom is, "Lincoln 1865." Left page, lower left. Page marked 125, but it is out of order.

Lincoln was first elected president in 1860 in a four-way race. His views clashed with Southern outlooks on several issues, states' rights being a major point of contention. Lincoln carried only two counties in the South.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carte de visite; Lincoln, Abraham, 1809-1865; Lincoln, Abraham, 1809-1865--Assassination; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
Portraits
